title: Patch 5.5 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hi Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

-Mindstar

well i see you had the problem that i'm having in all mac pc's, i have found a solution when this happens you have to "**press right shit when it happens**". I don't know why but when ever you press right shift it activates the glitch but then if you press it again it de activates it.
Looks like it's Mac Client based issue.

(Mac client only) Ok, I have the solution to this bug where you cant open stuff up, what you have to do is either; quit the game (takes forever to load back up) or you can spam Control+shift or Control+enter and then spam Escape within each one. It works for me. Hope this helps you out.

Sometimes when you're playing a game, you won't be able to buy anything and you won't be able to press Spacebar to keep to camera on you. Also, all you skills are on smart cast and you can't click on the mini-map to move the camera. This stops when you reconnect to game or when you die. You're not able to level up any abilities either. I'm on a MacBook

And, about the "Logging onto chat service" thing, I was able to connect to chat somehow. The next day I log in, it appears again. First I thought it was my internet being really bad but I tested my internet on some really popular sites and some games other than league of legends. Do you think there's a solution to this problem other than "Change Date & Time", "Get VPN", "Disable Firewall"
I'm having this precise same issue.  I've sent two tickets, still no response. This has lost me games for this happening at the wrong time.  I've tried all fixes but with no avail.

I seem to have a bug that my friends list just go into a mess and it annoying, I think it's when they log out or something I don't know the details but it happened too many times.
Massive FPS drops. done all the fixes and nothing... doing testing on bots/spectate and custom will post more as i narrow it down

There is a bug with Olaf right now, his axes from his Q are rooting me if he throws them where i am standing. As in, if the axe lands at my feet it roots me, if it passes through me its fine, but it roots me for like 2 seconds when landing on me.

Whenever I join a game, the loading screen doesn't appear. All I see is are blue boxes with summoner names, tiny icons and percentages over and a black screen, afterwards it would crash and the bugsplat message would appear. 

Please respond I want to play :(

Hello! So my issue is, sometimes when i die (which is quite often) there is a chance that my game bugs out and instead of the right click being blue, it goes red/orange. I also cant access the store, options or character info and I can't level up my abilities. When I am near an enemy or an enemy minion, it prioritises attacking the minion/enemy over moving. I play on a MacBook, so I'm not sure if this issue is popular.

Thanks for taking time to consider my issue and remember to stay frosty :P.
-Moreton

In twisted tree line, the item Ludens Echo is available to buy, however, it requires a needlessly large rod which you are unable to buy. This means that you have to buy the ather wisp and then save up for the full amount, instead of purchasing the two parts and the recipe.

I found 2 as soon as I logged on

1. The invite button in multiplayer wont stay set as invite and keeps turning off (Attempted 15 times each with several different people in several different lobbies, 7/15 worked) 
2. The runes and masteries selection tab in champion select shakes side to side non stop, this has happened in 5 games I played (Games kept getting canceled though) 

I found another one today, when you finish a game with a premade group of 2 and hit the play again button after game, it will take you to the custom game lobby to select a game to join, it seemed to work fine with 4 and 5, but with 2 (not yet tested 3) it takes you to custom game
(just tested 3 5 times, works normally with 3)

So yes 100% of games I have played with 2 people (me and friend) have taken me to the custom list game selection (40 games)

Incase this is of any importance, I am playing on a TOSHIBA windows 8.1 laptop, just incase

Hey Guys I get this message when Game starts...
''League of Legends (TM) Client has stopped working''

Please provide me with some solutions.

Thanks.
